animeTitle: Harbor Light Monogatari: Fashion Lala yori
animeDescription: A Cinderella story of sorts, Fashion Lala stars a little girl named Miho who doesn't get along with her family. Miho loves to design clothing, but her aunt and three cousins don't believe that such a young girl is capable and mock her designs. Meanwhile, a contest for the new "Disco Queen" is coming up, and Miho wants nothing more than to be able to design a dress for someone to wear to the competition, since she's too young to enter herself. With determination and a little bit of magic, Miho's dreams just might come true!
animeStaff: [['Takahashi, Motosuke', 'Director'], ['Matsuura, Noriyoshi', 'Sound Director'], ['Terada, Kenji', 'Script'], ['Kishi, Yoshiyuki', 'Character Design']]
